PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-16112012-11-29,  ,  ,  HRSDC,  CEIC,  , 
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS, in order to (1) limit access to maternity, parental and compassionate care benefits to qualifying individuals who are authorized to remain in Canada; and (2) simplify claims processing and increase the administrative flexibility of the EI program by foregoing the collection of overpayments when the administrative costs are greater than the potential amounts to be collected.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0261 Publication Date: 2012-12-19
AttachmentsAttachment
